author: amalp
title: Three days in Punjab
text: Originally Posted by amalp Hi All, From Sep-25 to Sep-28 I want to spend sometime visiting Punjab. Overall plan is to start from New Delhi on 25-Sep and visit Punjab and reach 29-Sep at Shimla/Sarhan thru Chandigarh. Any advice on a good itinerary during this time ? Thanks, Amal Sept. 25,26 you can visit Amritsar, Sept. 27 you can spend at Jalandhar and visit Devi Talab Mandir, and Sept. 28 can be spend at Chandigarh. If you interested in Fort, you can visit Bhatinda, Phillor, if you like you can visit Bhakra Dam and Shakti Peeth Mata Naina Devi. Tell your interests and someone can suggest you places. Best Regards,
